summary: Patsy from Monty Pythons Holy Grail as a follower
descriptionHtml:
This is requested mod:    http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/653745-patsy-as-a-follower/page__gopid__5168112#entry5168112

Patsy from Monty Pythons Holy Grail as a follower. He is a big coward when battle start but he can carry your stuff and follow you around. You can find him in Solitude making a fool of himself and pretending to read.


Installation:

Place .esp file in Data folder.
author: Skyrim76
